Detailed Description

Routines for grid refinement/coarsening operations.

Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine grid_refinement.coarsen ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell_coarse,nvar),intent(out)  coarse_data,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell_fine,nvar),intent(in)  fine_data,

integer,intent(in)  ncell_coarse,
integer,intent(in)  nvar 
)

Coarsen a solution at a fine level of resolution.

Parameters:
coarse_data Coarsened finial data (output)
fine_data Fine initial data (input)
ncell_fine Number of fine initial array cells
ncell_coarse Number of coarsened array cells
nvar Number of constituents
